text:
<@UK6TMUN5P>

For Historical values, you'll need to do it manually by Exporting property history
For new values, you can create a workflow that increases the number everytime someone changes their age in the system

If you are working for a specific HubSpot account, you can keep using Private apps.

If you are using the same app across multiple HubSpot accounts, you should create a HubSpot app with OAuth token.

Not sure if that answers your question

Thanks so much! I ended up using a webhook (with an API key instead of an app signature) plus a private API.

I am working mainly a single HubSpot account, using a second account for staging.
